item.title: [317] How to make a spot (SPOT ONLY) that is just for Owners? [317]
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

CroBunny:

ya,ya…i want that spot for only OWNERS and CO-OWNERS!!! its good if that spot tele other players… but i dont want any other players on that spot!!!

How about you go to

www.java.com

Read some tutorials and finish off what Reverce said, also, were not a “spoonfeeding” community, so don’t think it.

One rule you should remember,

You have the write to post something in the help section, but don’t expect a response.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] How to make a spot (SPOT ONLY) that is just for Owners? [317]
item.dc:creator: @CroBunny CroBunny
item.description:
@CroBunny wrote:

[quote=“reverce, post:5, topic:291712”]well then copy the wilderniss code and change if playerrights>3
tele **** *****
so if they step in the zone , they tele direclty away…

srr to lazy to write the code down.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2009, 10:08:55 am[/size][hr][quote author=Doobage link=topic=385492.msg2890605#msg2890605 date=1248883630]
make a spot, Make the command for owner only and make the xteleto option Disabled for all admins and only for owners that will Stop them From getting to you, but if you like to Code it some way else which i suggest Go for it
[/quote]
that’s nubish lol…[/quote]

man my signatures says something…ill need what file i need to edit, beggining code of the line and what to edit…

item.title: [317] How to make a spot (SPOT ONLY) that is just for Owners? [317]
item.dc:creator: @CroBunny CroBunny
item.description:
@CroBunny wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:2, topic:291712”] if(isInOwners() && playerRights != 3) { sendMessage("Hey you can't be here"!); triggertele(blah, blah, blah); } [/quote]

i want that other players cant step on that spot… x:xxx y:yyy and that only co owner can step on that coordinate/spot

item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

if(isInOwners() && playerRights != 3) {
sendMessage("Hey you can't be here"!);
triggertele(blah, blah, blah);
}
